Source.Comment: 2005-2014 additional petr sector emissions from, (McLinden etal 2016 (Space-based detection of missing sulfur dioxide sources of global air pollution), updated with "MEaSUREs SO2 source emission catalogue" from https://so2.gsfc.nasa.gov/measures.html. Downloaded: 12/10/2020, extended back to 1965 using refinery throughput and capacity, and from 1965 to 1960 using CDIAC CO2
